ygData.subject: Diety Question and a Warning
ygData.msgSnippet: For those quick browsers of messages, here is my warning.  I used the first level attack song alternating it mainly with the level 2 buff song when fighting in
ygData.messageBody:
For those quick browsers of messages, here is my warning. I used the first
level attack song alternating it mainly with the level 2 buff song when fighting
in and around my home town of Kelethin. Occasionally, when I run back to town
(NEVER still singing my attack song), a guard will kill me for no apparent
reason. Maybe it thinks I attacked another PC if he or she happened to run by,
but I really don't know. I fear that I have lost faction with my town, though I
receive no messages about it. Shopkeepers now look at me apprehensively, except
for my guild of course.

Anyway, on to my question. How much does a diety effect your actual abilities
and inter-race relations? I play a Wood Elf bard, and have enjoyed it immensly,
but chose my diety as Tunare for fear of fraction problems. I roleplay my
character as a romantic, so naturally Erolisi Marr (sp?) seems like a good
choice, but I am unsure of it's effects on others. Would love to hear from
another bard who has tried more than one diety perhaps.

Laeaus, Wood Elf Bard level...(sigh)...3
